description.en:
Event fired after the filtering has been executed and results are rendered.
Function takes arguments evt and ui.
Use ui.owner to get reference to igGridFiltering.
Use ui.owner.grid to get reference to igGrid.
Use ui.columnIndex to get column index.
Use ui.columnKey to get column key.
description.jp:
Event fired after the filtering has been executed and results are rendered.
Function takes arguments evt and ui.
Use ui.owner to get reference to igGridFiltering.
Use ui.owner.grid to get reference to igGrid.
Use ui.columnIndex to get column index.
Use ui.columnKey to get column key.

description.en:
Event fired before a filtering operation is executed (remote request or local).
Return false in order to cancel filtering operation.
Function takes arguments evt and ui.
Use ui.owner to get reference to igGridFiltering.
Use ui.owner.grid to get reference to igGrid.
Use ui.columnIndex to get column index.
Use ui.columnKey to get column key.

Use ui.owner to get reference to igGridFiltering.
Use ui.owner.grid to get reference to igGrid.
Use ui.dropDown to get reference to dropdown DOM element.

description.en: defines whether to show/hide editors in advanced mode. If false, no editors will be rendered in the advanced mode
description.jp: defines whether to show/hide editors in advanced mode. If false, no editors will be rendered in the advanced mode

description.en: location of the advanced filtering button when advancedModeEditorsVisible is false (i.e. when the button is rendered in the header)
description.jp: location of the advanced filtering button when advancedModeEditorsVisible is false (i.e. when the button is rendered in the header)

description.en: Enables or disables the filtering case sensitivity. Works only for local filtering.If true, it enables filtering case sensitivity. If false, it disables filtering case sensitivity.
description.jp: Enables or disables the filtering case sensitivity. Works only for local filtering.If true, it enables filtering case sensitivity. If false, it disables filtering case sensitivity.

description.en: a list of column settings that specifies custom filtering options on a per column basis
description.jp: a list of column settings that specifies custom filtering options on a per column basis

description.en: Specifies column key. Either key or index must be set in every column setting.
description.jp: Specifies column key. Either key or index must be set in every column setting.

description.en: Specifies column index. Either key or index must be set in every column setting.
description.jp: Specifies column index. Either key or index must be set in every column setting.

description.en: Enables/disables filtering for the column.
description.jp: Enables/disables filtering for the column.

description.en: Specifies filtering condition for the column
description.jp: Specifies filtering condition for the column

description.en: Initial filtering expressions - if set they will be applied on initialization
description.jp: Initial filtering expressions - if set they will be applied on initialization

description.en: Expression
description.jp: Expression

description.en: Condition
description.jp: Condition

description.en: Feature chooser text when filter is shown and filter mode is simple
description.jp: Feature chooser text when filter is shown and filter mode is simple

description.en: Feature chooser text when filter mode is advanced
description.jp: Feature chooser text when filter mode is advanced

description.en: Feature chooser text when filter is hidden and filter mode is simple
description.jp: Feature chooser text when filter is hidden and filter mode is simple

description.en: the filtering button for filter dropdowns can be rendered either on the left of the filter editor or on the right
description.jp: the filtering button for filter dropdowns can be rendered either on the left of the filter editor or on the right

description.en: Time in milliseconds for which widget will wait for keystrokes before sending filtering request.
description.jp: Time in milliseconds for which widget will wait for keystrokes before sending filtering request.

description.en: add button width - in the advanced filter dialog
description.jp: add button width - in the advanced filter dialog

description.en: The dialog Add button width in pixels (100px).
description.jp: The dialog Add button width in pixels (100px).

description.en: The dialog Add button width as a number (100).
description.jp: The dialog Add button width as a number (100).

description.en: Custom template for options in dropdown in add condition area in the filter dialog.
description.jp: Custom template for options in dropdown in add condition area in the filter dialog.

description.en: Custom template for add condition area in the filter dialog.
description.jp: Custom template for add condition area in the filter dialog.

description.en: Width of the column chooser dropdowns in the advanced filter dialog
description.jp: Width of the column chooser dropdowns in the advanced filter dialog

description.en: The column chooser dropdowns width in pixels (80px).
description.jp: The column chooser dropdowns width in pixels (80px).

description.en: The column chooser dropdowns width as a number (80).
description.jp: The column chooser dropdowns width as a number (80).

description.en:
Controls containment behavior.
owner The filter dialog will be draggable only in the grid area
window The filter dialog will be draggable in the whole window area
description.jp:
Controls containment behavior.
owner The filter dialog will be draggable only in the grid area
window The filter dialog will be draggable in the whole window area

description.en: width of the filtering expression input boxes in the advanced filter dialog
description.jp: width of the filtering expression input boxes in the advanced filter dialog

description.en: The filtering expression input boxes width in pixels (80px).
description.jp: The filtering expression input boxes width in pixels (80px).

description.en: The filtering expression input boxes width as a number (80).
description.jp: The filtering expression input boxes width as a number (80).

description.en: Custom template for options in condition list in filter dialog
description.jp: Custom template for options in condition list in filter dialog

description.en: Width of the filtering condition dropdowns in the advanced filter dialog
description.jp: Width of the filtering condition dropdowns in the advanced filter dialog

description.en: The filtering condition dropdowns width in pixels (80px).
description.jp: The filtering condition dropdowns width in pixels (80px).

description.en: The filtering condition dropdowns width as a number (80).
description.jp: The filtering condition dropdowns width as a number (80).

description.en: Custom template for filter dialog
description.jp: Custom template for filter dialog

description.en: default filter dialog height (used for Advanced filtering)
description.jp: default filter dialog height (used for Advanced filtering)

description.en: The dialog window height in pixels (350px).
description.jp: The dialog window height in pixels (350px).

description.en: The dialog window height as a number (350).
description.jp: The dialog window height as a number (350).

description.en: Maximum number of filter rows in the advanced filtering dialog. if this number is exceeded, an error message will be rendered
description.jp: Maximum number of filter rows in the advanced filtering dialog. if this number is exceeded, an error message will be rendered

description.en: maximum filter dialog height (used for Advanced filtering)
description.jp: maximum filter dialog height (used for Advanced filtering)

description.en: The dialog window height in pixels (350px).
description.jp: The dialog window height in pixels (350px).

description.en: The dialog window height as a number (350).
description.jp: The dialog window height as a number (350).

description.en: Width of the Ok and Cancel buttons in the advanced filtering dialogs
description.jp: Width of the Ok and Cancel buttons in the advanced filtering dialogs

description.en: The advanced filter dialog Ok and Cancel buttons width in pixels (120px).
description.jp: The advanced filter dialog Ok and Cancel buttons width in pixels (120px).

description.en: The advanced filter dialog Ok and Cancel buttons width as a number (120).
description.jp: The advanced filter dialog Ok and Cancel buttons width as a number (120).

description.en: default filter dialog width (used for Advanced filtering)
description.jp: default filter dialog width (used for Advanced filtering)

description.en: The dialog window width in pixels (370px).
description.jp: The dialog window width in pixels (370px).

description.en: The dialog window width as a number (370).
description.jp: The dialog window width as a number (370).

description.en: animation duration in milliseconds for the filter dropdown animations
description.jp: animation duration in milliseconds for the filter dropdown animations

description.en: type of animations for the column filter dropdowns
description.jp: type of animations for the column filter dropdowns

description.en:
Height of the column filter dropdowns
string The height of the column filter dropdowns in pixels (0px).
number The height of the column filter dropdowns as a number (0).
description.jp:
Height of the column filter dropdowns
string The height of the column filter dropdowns in pixels (0px).
number The height of the column filter dropdowns as a number (0).

description.en: Enable/disable filter icons visibility.
description.jp: Enable/disable filter icons visibility.

description.en: width of the column filter dropdowns
description.jp: width of the column filter dropdowns

description.en: The width in pixels (0px)
description.jp: The width in pixels (0px)

description.en: The width as a number (0)
description.jp: The width as a number (0)

description.en: URL key name that specifies how the filtering expressions will be encoded for remote requests, e.g. &filter('col') = startsWith. Default is OData
description.jp: URL key name that specifies how the filtering expressions will be encoded for remote requests, e.g. &filter('col') = startsWith. Default is OData

description.en: Enable/disable footer visibility with summary info about the filter.If false, the filter summary row (in the footer) will only be visible when paging is enabled (or some other feature that renders a footer)
description.jp: Enable/disable footer visibility with summary info about the filter.If false, the filter summary row (in the footer) will only be visible when paging is enabled (or some other feature that renders a footer)

description.en: Summary template that will appear in the bottom left corner of the footer. Has the format '${matches} matching records'
description.jp: Summary template that will appear in the bottom left corner of the footer. Has the format '${matches} matching records'

description.en: A list of configurable and localized labels that will be used for teh predefnied filtering conditions in the filter dropdowns.
description.jp: A list of configurable and localized labels that will be used for teh predefnied filtering conditions in the filter dropdowns.

description.en: Default is 'simple' for non-virtualized grids, and 'advanced' when virtualization is enabled
description.jp: Default is 'simple' for non-virtualized grids, and 'advanced' when virtualization is enabled

description.en: renders just a filter row
description.jp: renders just a filter row

description.en: allows to configure multiple filters from a dialog - Excel style
description.jp: allows to configure multiple filters from a dialog - Excel style

description.en: list of configurable and localized null texts that will be used for the filter editors
description.jp: list of configurable and localized null texts that will be used for the filter editors

description.en: Render in feature chooser. Feature chooser is dialog which lists all the enabled features (like Sorting, Filtering, Hiding etc.) of igGrid.
description.jp: Render in feature chooser. Feature chooser is dialog which lists all the enabled features (like Sorting, Filtering, Hiding etc.) of igGrid.

description.en: Enable/disable filter button visibility. If false,no filter dropdown buttons will be rendered and predefined list of filters will not be rendered for the columns
description.jp: Enable/disable filter button visibility. If false,no filter dropdown buttons will be rendered and predefined list of filters will not be rendered for the columns

description.en: Enable/disable empty condition visibility in the filter. If true, shows empty and not empty filtering conditions in the dropdowns
description.jp: Enable/disable empty condition visibility in the filter. If true, shows empty and not empty filtering conditions in the dropdowns

description.en: Enable/disable visibility of null and not null filtering conditions in the dropdowns. If true, shows null and not null filtering conditions in the dropdowns
description.jp: Enable/disable visibility of null and not null filtering conditions in the dropdowns. If true, shows null and not null filtering conditions in the dropdowns

description.en: custom tooltip template for the filter button, when a filter is applied
description.jp: custom tooltip template for the filter button, when a filter is applied

description.en: Type of filtering. Delegates all filtering functionality to the $.ig.DataSource.
description.jp: Type of filtering. Delegates all filtering functionality to the $.ig.DataSource.
